title: HyperX SoloCast 2 Review: A built-in stand that you'll want to mount
summary: The HyperX SoloCast 2 is an impressive $60 cardioid mic with a clever built-in stand, but you'll still want to mount it on a boom arm for the best results.

title: Spurs open to selling forward Johnson
summary: Tottenham's Europa League final match-winner Brennan Johnson is facing an uncertain future at the club amid growing Premier League interest in the attacker.

title: North Korean infiltrator caught working in Amazon IT department thanks to lag â€” 110ms keystroke input raises red flags over true location
summary: A North Korean imposter was uncovered, working as a sysadmin at Amazon U.S., after their keystroke input lag raised suspicions with security specialists at the online retail giant.

title: Bell starts as McCloskey returns for Ulster's Leinster trip
summary: Australia prop Angus Bell will make his first Ulster start in Friday's United Rugby Championship game against Leinster at Aviva Stadium (19:45 GMT).

title: OnePlus 15 vs. OnePlus 13
summary: Although the OnePlus 13 was released last year, it's actually a 2025 flagship, just like its successor, the OnePlus 15. title: '$100 Steam Machine' uses a cut-down PS5 APU with Bazzite â€” DIY console offers 60 FPS at 1080p with 16GB of GDDR6
